about_the_game: Thank you for your support. This is a donation type DLC. With your support, I will update the game content more quickly. In order to thank you for your support plan, I will give you a lockable prop that can skip the door opening game later in the game to show my gratitude. With the update of the game, the price of this DLC may increase, and the items or content presented will also increase. I hope to bring more benefits to early supporters in this way.

content_descriptors.notes: Including nudity, sexual behavior, and involuntary sexual behavior

detailed_description: Thank you for your support. This is a donation type DLC. With your support, I will update the game content more quickly. In order to thank you for your support plan, I will give you a lockable prop that can skip the door opening game later in the game to show my gratitude. With the update of the game, the price of this DLC may increase, and the items or content presented will also increase. I hope to bring more benefits to early supporters in this way.
name: 零号协议AgreementZero-捐助

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7/8/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300t or equivalent [4 or more hardware threads]
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7/8/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 3060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 16GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
